item.title: ヴァーチャル会議に招待されたレイオフされた従業員が、親指を立てる絵文字で指導部に殺到したため、ヴァーチャルタウンホールを閉鎖した（Charlie Nash/Mediaite）
item.description:
Charlie Nash / Mediaite:
Vice shuts down a virtual town hall after laid off employees invited to the virtual meeting inundated leadership with thumbs down emojis  —  A virtual Vice Media town hall had to be prematurely shut down on Wednesday after staffers flooded the meeting with thumbs-down emojis to protest the company's mass layoffs.

item.title: デジタル新聞のパイオニア、ロジャー・フィドラーの経歴から読み解く、ハイテクがジャーナリズムのビジネスをどう変えるか、新聞社のリーダーたちはどのように試行錯誤したのか（David Streitfeld/New York Times）
item.description:
David Streitfeld / New York Times:
How newspaper leaders tried and failed to see how tech would change the business of journalism, framed by the career of digital newspaper pioneer Roger Fidler  —  Roger Fidler tried his best, but the excellent business of journalism is gone for good.  Can the idea of “news” survive in a digital world?

item.title: アナリストリライアンスとディズニー・インディアのメディア合併は、インドのオンデマンド・ストリーミング・サービス視聴者の85％、テレビ視聴者の〜50％を獲得する事業体を生み出す（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Analysts: Reliance-Disney India media merger will create an entity that captures 85% of India's on-demand streaming service audience and ~50% of the TV viewers  —  The merger of Indian media assets of Reliance, its portfolio Viacom18 and Disney will create an entity that captures 85% …

item.title: ホワイトハウス、Fox Newsにバイデン氏への贈賄疑惑報道を修正するよう要請：フォックスは修正を拒否（オリバー・ダーシー/CNN）
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
The White House calls on Fox News to correct coverage of bribery claims against Biden by an informant now charged with lying; source: Fox declines to make fixes  —  The White House is formally calling on Fox News to correct its dishonest coverage of bribery and corruption allegations against President Joe Biden.

item.title: OnlyFansのCEOであるKeily Blair氏とのQ&A：設立以来クリエイターへの150億ドル以上の支払い、サイトに対する否定的な認識、スポーツやその他のコンテンツのホスティング、AIなどについて（Cristina Criddle/Financial Times）
item.description:
Cristina Criddle / Financial Times:
Q&A with OnlyFans CEO Keily Blair on paying out $15B+ to creators since inception, negative perceptions of the site, hosting sports and other content, AI, more  —  The platform's boss is proud of its adult-content creators — and dismissive of banks that shun them

item.title: パラマウントのナヴィーン・チョプラCFOによると、現在進行中の番組編成のシフトと以前発表されたレイオフにより、第1四半期に約10億ドルの費用が発生する見込み（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Paramount CFO Naveen Chopra says the company expects to take about a $1B charge in Q1 due to ongoing programming shifts and previously announced layoffs  —  Paramount Global expects to take a $1 billion charge in the current quarter due to ongoing programming shifts and the layoffs it announced earlier this month.

item.title: NYTのニュースルームのスタッフ460人の学歴を分析したところ、アイビーリーグ出身者が過剰に多く、スタッフの約75％はアイビーリーグ出身者ではない（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
An analysis of educational backgrounds of 460 NYT newsroom staff members shows the Ivy League is over-represented; about 75% of staffers are not Ivy Leaguers  —  They're not a majority, based on a new look at education data, but they are wildly overrepresented.

item.title: E.W.スクリプス社、ケイト・オブライアンをニュース担当社長に任命、スクリプスニュース、コートTV、地元メディア局のニュース業務全般を担当（ラジオ＆テレビビジネスレポート）
item.description:
Radio & Television Business Report:
The E.W. Scripps Company names Kate O'Brian as president of news, responsible for Scripps News, Court TV, and all news operations at local media stations  —  CINCINNATI — The E.W. Scripps Company has selected Kate O'Brian to fill the newly created role of President/News.

item.title: Substackがダイレクト・メッセージを初公開、1対1のプライベートな会話が可能に。デフォルトでは、ユーザーはつながっている相手からのDMしか受け取れない（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Substack debuts direct messaging, letting users have private one-on-one conversations; by default, users will only receive DMs from people they're connected to  —  Substack is introducing direct messaging, allowing users to have private one-on-one conversations, the company announced today.

item.title: ASCAP、2023年の売上高は前年比14.1％増の17億3,700万ドル、印税分配可能額は15億9,200万ドル、米公演収入は前年比12.6％増の13億2,700万ドルを突破（Jem Aswad/Variety）

Jem Aswad / Variety:
ASCAP reports $1.737B in 2023 revenue, up 14.1% YoY, and $1.592B available for royalty distributions; US performance revenue surpassed $1.327B, up 12.6% YoY  —  The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers (ASCAP) announced record financial results for 2023 …

item.title: Raw Story、AlterNet、そして別件でThe InterceptがOpenAIを著作権侵害でNY連邦裁判所に提訴、The Interceptはマイクロソフトも提訴（Yiwen Lu/New York Times）
item.description:
Yiwen Lu / New York Times:
Raw Story, AlterNet, and, in a separate case, The Intercept sue OpenAI in a NY federal court for copyright infringement; The Intercept is also suing Microsoft  —  Raw Story, AlterNet and The Intercept sued for copyright infringement over the way the ChatGPT creator trains its technology.

The BBC says it is running 12 generative AI pilots, including reformatting and translating existing content and a “headline helper” for journalists  —  Rhodri Talfan Davies is the BBC's Director of Nations.  He's responsible for bringing teams together across the BBC to shape …

item.description:
Alexandra Bruell / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Essence Magazine's parent company is in talks to buy Refinery29 from Vice Media, which acquired the women's lifestyle site in 2019 for $400M  —  Vice, which acquired the women's lifestyle site in 2019 for $400 million, is retrenching under new ownership

item.title: ユニバーサルミュージック、人員削減と効率化により2026年までに年間2億7000万ドル以上の経費削減を計画、第4四半期の売上は前年同期比9％増の35億ドル（Thania Garcia/Variety）
item.description:

Universal Music plans $270M+ in annual run-rate savings by 2026, through headcount reduction and efficiencies, and reports 9% YoY revenue growth in Q4 to $3.5B  —  In its latest earnings report, Universal Music Group touted top-selling acts including Taylor Swift, the Rolling Stones, Drake …
